__TOC__


Links to automated testing projects and wiki pages focused on specific testing efforts.

==== Projects ====
* <nowiki>[[http://friendly.ubuntu.com|Ubuntu Friendly]]</nowiki> - Community driven hardware validation testing using Checkbox
* <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/ubuntu-server-iso-testing|Ubuntu ISO Testing]]</nowiki> - Tests that validate the stability of ISO installations (Server, Desktop, Alternate)
* <nowiki>[[Desktop|Desktop Testing]]</nowiki> - Automation of the desktop tests using LDTP.

==== Tools ====
* <nowiki>[[Checkbox|Checkbox]]</nowiki> - Application to launch tests and send results to Launchpad.
* <nowiki>[[http://sikuli.org|Sikuli]]</nowiki> - GUI Testing Automation Framework
* <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/update-manager|Auto Update Tester]]</nowiki> - Validate upgrades using !AutoUpgradeTester which is part of update-manager
* <nowiki>[[http://autotest.github.com/|Autotest]]</nowiki> - Automated Testing Framework
* <nowiki>[[http://www.linux-kvm.org/page/KVM-Autotest|KVM Autotest]]</nowiki> - Automated testing of ISO images in VMs
* <nowiki>[[http://www.phoronix-test-suite.com/|Phoronix Test Suite]]</nowiki> - Cross-platform automated benchmarking/test suite

==== Other ====

* <nowiki>[[http://brainstorm.ubuntu.com/idea/22681/]]</nowiki>
